name: The light of darkness
description:
Second work in collection “Seaman’s life”
One of the most dangerous accidents at sea it’s blackout(of course big fire, capsizing or grounding worst, but blackout also scary)
Just imagine that hundred miles around you can be nothing. Rainy night without moon, all lights died and you can sea nothing. Better don’t think that closest land 1-2 km down. 
But for such situations we have tons of spare generators and batteries, so this is the way to survive.
No any postproduction made on this photo.
